description.value: Tortoise-like creatures, telias can retract their heads and limbs into their shells for protection. Compressors within your skeleton grant you a similar defense. When you take the total defense action, you gain a +6 bonus to your Armor Class (instead of the usual +4 bonus), and also gain the @Compendium[sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.HVIRnDYhdYvXIp37]{Unflankable} universal creature rule until the start of your next turn.
